Title: Day 6: 11:00 P.M. - 12:00 A.M.
Plot: Cheng offers to exchange the nuclear component for Audrey's life. Jack gains Chloe's covert cooperation, but their plans are dashed when Morris stumbles on to the operation.Wayne gives Daniels an unpleasant ultimatum, but his fragile health soon tips the balance in the vice-president's favor.
GuestStars: Mary Chris Wall, Mike Smith, Jim Holmes, William Bumiller, Matt McKenzie, Rueben Grundy
